name: Chronarr
description: Synchronizes TV episode and movie DateCreated to preserve import dates in Jellyfin
overview: This plugin automatically syncs PremiereDate to DateCreated for TV episodes and movies to ensure Jellyfin displays the correct import date from the Chronarr database instead of scan dates.

versions.changelog: Fix: Real-time sync thread affinity issue resolved; Changed async void event handler pattern to prevent silent failures
Rebranded to Chronarr with database-first architecture
